name: DecorateBiomeEvent
description: DecorateBiomeEvent is fired when a BiomeDecorator is created. This event is fired whenever a BiomeDecorator is created in DeferredBiomeDecorator#fireCreateEventAndReplace(BiomeGenBase). world contains the world that is being decorated. rand contains an instance of Random to be used. pos contains the coordinates of the Chunk being decorated. This event is not Cancelable . This event does not have a result. Event.HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#TERRAIN_GEN_BUS .
